plain: The user's favourite genre is likely to be drama, as several of the movies listed fall into that category. The user's favourite setting is likely to be historical or fantasy, as several of the movies are set in different time periods or imaginary worlds. The user's favourite visual style is likely to be realistic, as many of the movies have high-quality special effects and cinematography. The user's favourite writing style is likely to be character-driven and dialogue-heavy, as many of the movies have complex and relatable characters. The user's favourite runtime is likely to be around 2-3 hours, as many of the movies are of that length. The user's favourite themes are likely to be redemption, sacrifice, and the human spirit.
